snippet: Societally, we've effectively offered ourselves and our families up as an inadvertent, uncontrolled experiment in absorbing a cumulative chemical load. Now what?
abstract: Societally, we've effectively offered ourselves and our families up as an inadvertent, uncontrolled experiment in absorbing a cumulative chemical load. Now what?

headline.main: Is the 'Household Chemical Purge' the New Baby-Proofing?
